description:
Smartphone convenience in a rugged package, ready for life’s adventures, and misadventures. The 66i merges Garmin’s background in handheld GPS, with their inReach satellite communication, blending these technologies into a compact device for navigation and communication way, way off-grid. The Iridium satellite network lets you send and receive text messages and emails anywhere on the planet (subscription required). Each message contains your GPS location data, so followers can track your adventures. If things take a turn for the worse, a dedicated SOS button means that help is never out of range. Preloaded with TOPO maps for Canada and the US, the 66i helps smooth out bumps in backcountry navigation, and you can plan your trip on a computer or phone with the free Garmin Explore™ app. Use Explore to map your adventure then send your planned routes and tracks to your 66i, no cell network required. Explore is not the only app that makes life with the 66i better, the free Connect™ app works with your smartphone and opens up a whole new side of the 66i. Connect lets you review activities, set-up live tracking sessions, monitor weather, review satellite imagery, receive notifications and more.

  • Preloaded with Canadian and US topographical maps
  • Garmin Explore website and app let you synch routes, tracks and waypoints to your device. You can download map data to your phone and use your phone to plan routes and tracks, and then send those plans to your 66i, all without cell reception
  • LiveTrack™ (through a connected smartphone) and MapShare® (through your Iridium subscription) allows you to share your location and more, with friends, family, or followers
  • World SOS coverage that gives you a confirmation message from the rescue centre, letting you know help is on the way. 2-way texting allows you to stay in contact with rescue personnel
  • SOS messages are received by GEOS, a worldwide emergency response center with 24/7/365 staffing
  • SOS button has a hard-plastic cover, to prevent an accidental activation
  • Uses Iridium’s constellation of 66 satellites for coverage of the earth's entire surface. Messages are buffered for up to a day
  • Iridium’s worldwide coverage lets you send texts and emails from anywhere in the world, how many you send and how detailed they are, depends on what level plan you have
  • Messages have your GPS location embedded, letting your rescuers, friends, family or followers know exactly where you are
  • SOS/PLB functionality and all off-grid communication requires a separate satellite plan to activate, GPS functionality works all the time, no plan required
  • Monthly plans are available, as well as seasonal hibernation options that allow you to pay a minimal fee during months when you are not using the device
  • Active weather provides real-time radar tracking, via a connected smartphone running Garmin Connect. When not connected to your phone’s cellular network, detailed weather forecasts for your location, a specific waypoint, or a GPS coordinate, can be accessed via your Iridium satellite plan
  • Free Garmin Connect mobile app allows you to customize your 66i experience, choosing which widgets to show and when, reviewing stored activity data, selecting which apps can push notifications, loading and synching geocaching data and more
  • Smart notifications (emails, texts, alerts, etc.) come in via Bluetooth connection to your smartphone
  • Connect IQ support allows you to download apps, templates, data fields and other features
  • Preloaded with a free trial of the Wikiloc app, that has more than 9 million trails available
  • Connects to GPS and Galileo satellite constellations for fast signal acquisition and a strong connection nearly anywhere
  • Satellite caching allows your 66i to save an extended predicted orbit path (EPO) file, this way it knows where to look for satellites when you turn it on, meaning a fast and accurate satellite signal
  • Bluetooth Smart, ANT+ and Wi-Fi compatibility let you explore smarter with compatible activity sensors and accessories
  • Barometric altimeter helps you track your ascents, descents and total elevation changes
  • Tilt compensated 3-axis electronic compass shows your heading even when you are stationary, ensuring that you are always facing the right direction
  • Rechargeable internal battery pack delivers up to 35 hours of battery life with 10-minute logging, or 200 hours with 30-minute logging
  • Large 3 in. screen is bright and clear making it easy to read in all conditions, even direct sun
  • 16GB of internal memory can be increased via MicroSD cards (not included)
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your 66i from even the heaviest downpours
  • Built-in LED flashlight helps you get back safe if you get caught out after dark, there is even an S.O.S. mode should things take turn for the worse
  • In the box: GPSMAP 66i preloaded with TOPO Canada and US maps, USB cable, carabiner clip and documentation
name: Garmin GPSMAP 66i GPS
